name: Trapchat - Visual Novel
description:
Hi guys this is Impersonal Studio's latest game! We just released it, come and find out more about it on Patreon :)

It is chapter based, and I would like to describe that information a bit more for you all to know what to expect. You are using an app to chat with multiple characters and to fool them into giving personal informations about their lives (photos, location, secrets...).

Each month we are going to release a full chapter on our game. After the Chapter II release Patrons will be able to vote for future mini games, and also characters that they want to see as "extra quests".

Chapter I is about 20 minutes gameplay with multiple endings! Be aware that this is a casual adult game.
